title: Gr8

author: Tony C
comment: Pictures make it look like it supports round screens but on my lg g watch r the play area is still square

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Tony, This game support Moto 360, for LG G watch R our team will fix this issue in next update.

title: Misleading

author: Mike Hastey
comment: Everytime I hit buy to buy Batman, it always goes to the screen where it shows $0.99 for 1,000 coins and I do have like 517 coins, enough to buy Batman. Also, I bought the magnet just fine without going to the buying advertisement once. ???????
title: Can't buy Batman!

comment: Doesn't work on asus zenwatch 2
title: Won't even work

author: Aysha Noor
comment: Deadly Spikes is my one of the favorit game

author: Julia Morgan
comment: A wearing game with good graphics and smooth game play.  Very nice effort by the publisher. 5 stars for it.
title: Android Wear Nice Game

author: Adriano Regino
comment: Nice game with a simple gameplay, very cool for spending time and has a sweet aestetic.

author: adnan aldeen
comment: amazing Deadly Spikes game it's simple and funny

author: Jully Jain
comment: Android Wear support game i like it.............

author: katie alma
comment: It is a great game,

author: George Nixon
comment: Not a bad thing to play with, to kill a minute or two. The only problem is, I find it hard to find an area of the screen I can tap without blocking my view of the action with my finger.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: George thank you if you found it entertaining it means a lot to us. About small view and tap issue here is a tip, remove finger after bird collide the side wall to view new spikes. Hope this helps.

title: Pretty neat

author: Laird Anthony McCann
comment: Could be a really fun game, but the lack of support for the LG G Watch R is disappointing. The screen doesn't fit correctly for the fully round display, and defaults to the square display instead. If this was fixed, I'd be happy to up my rating.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Anthony, LG G watch R issue will be fixed soon as our team is working on it. Stay tuned thank you.

title: Okay

author: Abbas Hamdan
comment: Fantastic

author: Steven Moran
comment: Sending an email to every single email I am using on my device to announce your new apps and signing me up to newsletters is not cool. Uninstalling.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Steven, we apologize for the inconvenience in this regard. You can unsubscribe from the newsletter by clicking the link given below in the newsletter. Any user can anytime opt-out from the list and we don't send them the email again as per their selection. Thank you

title: Misappropriation of access

author: Matt Echevarria
comment: I uninstalled it because I couldn't get out of it. I found it that you have to use 2 different fingers And press the screen to exit
title: Uninstalled...But

author: Javier de Alfonso
comment: Please add support for LG G Watch R.

author: Abdullah Asif
comment: Needs screen fitting on g watch r

author: Jack Boykin
comment: Best android wear game yet with complete support for Moto 360
title: Moto 360

author: Ethan Sanchez
comment: How do you exit the app. I can not get out of the app.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Ethan, we apologize for the inconvenience in this regard. Please cover the watch face with your palm to close the game. Thank you

title: Help

author: Vincent
comment: I can't seem to find the app on my moto 360

author: Trevor Sherman
comment: Just closes and goes back to home screen also froze my watch

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Trevor, We apologize for the inconvenience caused in this regard. The game is working perfectly on Moto 360 and we have not faced any issues. Please update and try again. If the problem persists, let us know at feedback@teensystudios.com with screenshots. Thanks

title: Doesn't work on moto 360

author: Brody Moore
comment: Moto 360, it won't boot. Froze my watch as well.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Brody, We apologize for the inconvenience caused in this regard. We have tested it at Moto 360 and its working fine. Can you please tell us the exact issues? Please send the screenshots at feedback@teensystudios.com so we may resolve your issue. Thank you

reply.content: Hello Thomas, We apologize for the inconvenience caused in this regard. The game is working perfectly on Moto 360 and we have not faced any issues. Please update and try again. If the problem persists, let us know at feedback@teensystudios.com with screenshots. Thanks

comment: I couldn't score more but its good to have in smartwatch
title: Addicting fun

author: Wes J
comment: Not sure why a flappy clone should need to use 65mb of data over a 30 minute period when its not running. Sure makes me think there are shenanigans going on. Uninstalled.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Wes, We apologize for the inconvenience in this regard. We have resolved the glitch and it should work perfectly now. Please update the game and let us know if you face any issue again. Thank you

title: Uses data for no apparent reason

author: Callan Brown
comment: Used 150mb in background data in the first hour of use!!  Something is wrong with it.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Callan, We apologize for the inconvenience in this regard. We have resolved the glitch and it should work perfectly now. Please update the game and let us know if you face any issue again. Thank you

title: Warning eats data

author: Eric Bell
comment: This app used over 2 gbs of background data in one day! I ended up going over my limit for the month because of it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Eric, We apologize for the inconvenience in this regard. We have resolved the glitch and it should work perfectly now. Please update the game and let us know if you face any issue again. Thank you
